Class AIPlayer

java.lang.Object
Player
AIPlayer
public class AIPlayer extends Player
AIPlayer is an AI player for the ScrabbleGame

  • Method Details

    • GetPossibleMoves

      public ArrayList<AIPlayer.AIPlay> GetPossibleMoves(ScrabbleModel model)
      Returns a list of every possible play the AI could make. The plays are not necessarily valid.
      Parameters:
      model - The model of the ScrabbleGame
      Returns:
      An ArrayList of every play the AI could make, valid or not.

    • GetCandidateWords

      protected HashMap<Character,ArrayList<String>> GetCandidateWords(ScrabbleModel model)
      Returns a HashMap of almost possible words the AI could play with its held tiles and any additional letter (which would exist on the board). The HashMap has a list of possible words for each (hypothetical) board letter.
      Parameters:
      model - The model of the ScrabbleGame
      Returns:
      A HashMap containing lists of words that could be played on a letter on the board (which is the key)
